data.title: TASIS School in Dorado: College Acceptances
data.meta_description: College Acceptances - TASIS School in Dorado
data.text:
Colleges Offering Admission to the 65 Members of the Class of 2023

TASIS Dorado is proud to announce our current slate of outstanding college acceptances from the great Class of 2023! Impressively, our seniors were accepted to a total of 349 colleges and universities and so far have received over $7,153,703.48 in merit-based scholarships and awards.

CLASS OF 2023

Acceptances: 397 (as of 05/09)

Merit Scholarship: $7,459,203.48 (approximately as 4/27)

AP Scholar: 6

AP Capstone: 8

AP Scholar with Honor: 5

AP Scholar with Distinction: 21

AP Seminar and Research Certificate: 5

Coca-Cola Scholarship Semifinalist: 1

National Merit Semifinalist: 2

National Merit Finalists: 2

NatStuCo Distinguished Student Leader: 1

National Hispanic Recognition: 14

National Honor Society Scholarship Finalists: 2

US Presidential Scholars Program Candidates: 14

US Presidential Scholars Program Semifinalist: 1

Congratulations!

#TDBearPride rings true today, and every day, as our TD Bears further their education at some of the finest colleges and universities across the globe.

Early Decision, Early Action, and Regular Admissions (so far!)

Stay tuned for more great news in the coming weeks as the Class of 2023 continues to receive additional college acceptances!

Colleges Offering Admission to the 60 Members of the Class of 2022

TASIS Dorado is proud to announce our current slate of outstanding college acceptances from the great Class of 2022! Impressively, our seniors were accepted to a total of 291 colleges and universities and so far have received over $5,219,796 in merit-based scholarships and awards. Also, the Seniors have been awarded 9 National Hispanic Recognition Program Scholars and 1 National Merit Scholar Finalist! Congratulations!

#TDBearPride rings true today, and every day, as our TD Bears further their education at some of the finest colleges and universities across the globe.

Early Decision, Early Action, and Regular Admissions (so far!)

Stay tuned for more great news in the coming weeks as the Class of 2022 continues to receive additional college acceptances!

Colleges Offering Admission to the 42 Members of the Class of 2021

TASIS Dorado is proud to announce our current slate of outstanding college acceptances from the great Class of 2021! Despite extreme adversity in the midst of a historic global challenge, our Seniors have risen to the occasion with courage, resilience, and character. Impressively, our seniors were accepted to a total of 211 colleges and universities and received over $4M in merit-based scholarships and awards. Congratulations!

A heartfelt THANK YOU goes out to the dedicated staff of the TASIS Dorado College Counseling Center for their unwavering commitment to supporting our students in their pursuit of academic excellence.

#TDBearPride rings true today, and every day, as our TD Bears further their education at some of the finest colleges and universities across the globe.

Early Decision, Early Action, and Regular Admissions

Stay tuned for more great news in the coming weeks as the Class of 2021 continues to receive additional college acceptances!
